meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I'm doing well enough in my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Christina, a senior Psychology major. This semester has been especially tough — I’m taking a lot of different courses, including some really challenging ones like addiction psychology and trauma intervention, and I’m feeling like I’m falling behind. I’ve been working hard, but I’m also starting to question if I even like psychology or if I should be majoring in something else. I’m struggling to focus and feel like I’m losing interest, even though I’ve really enjoyed some of the content I’m learning. I feel like I’m not doing well enough in class to pass, but I also feel like I’m not really engaged with the material enough to pass on my own. I’m worried that I’m falling behind and that I’m not going to graduate on time, which would be devastating for my mental health and my future.
